KeysToEntries.BoneArrows: Arrows with tips carved from animal fangs.
KeysToEntries.BronzeArrow: Arrows with tips forged from bronze.
KeysToEntries.IronArrows: Arrows with tips forged from iron.
KeysToEntries.StoneArrows: Arrows with tips of splintered stone.
KeysToEntries.AdventurersTunic: Basic and comfortable attire fit for a new Adventurer.
KeysToEntries.ApprenticeRobe: Provides basic protection for trainees in the magical arts.
KeysToEntries.ReinforcedBody: A heavy chestplate made from Leather and Bone.
KeysToEntries.BronzePlatebody: A heavy chestplate made from bronze.
KeysToEntries.HardLeatherBody: Durable armour crafted from hard leather.
KeysToEntries.DarkMageRobes: Magical armour for the edgier wizard.
KeysToEntries.DragonkinMageRobes: Robes styled after the ancient overlords of Ashenfall.
KeysToEntries.IronPlatebody: A heavy iron chestplate, providing superior protection in battle.
KeysToEntries.PaladinPlatebody: A heavy chestplate worn by the Paladin's of Saradomin.
KeysToEntries.StuddedLeatherArmour: Durable armour crafted from hard leather reinforced with iron studs.
KeysToEntries.WildArcherBody: Durable armour worn by a Wild Knight archer.
KeysToEntries.AlphaCape: A badge of honor for those who completed all challenges during the closed Alpha Test.
KeysToEntries.ArtisanCape: The cape worn by master craftworkers.
KeysToEntries.AttackCape: The cape worn by masters of Attack.
KeysToEntries.BloodblightCape: A cloak commemorating a dragon's vengeance.
KeysToEntries.BramblemeadCape: A cloak to remember the simpler times.
KeysToEntries.ConstructionCape: The cape worn by master builders.
KeysToEntries.CookingCape: The cape worn by the world's best chefs.
KeysToEntries.EarlyAccessCape: A cape worn by Ashenfall's first explorers.
KeysToEntries.FracturedCape: A cloak warning against the danger of hubris.
KeysToEntries.GarouCape: A cloak worn by garou nobility.
KeysToEntries.GoblinCape: A cloak reminding us that even gods can be forgotten.
KeysToEntries.MiningCape: The cape worn by the most skilled miners.
KeysToEntries.RunecraftingCape: The cape worn by master runecrafters.
KeysToEntries.WoodcuttingCape: The cape worn by master woodcutters.
KeysToEntries.BagOfNoggin: The only thing this protects is your identity.
KeysToEntries.EarlyAdopterHead: A scarf worn by Ashenfall's first explorers.
KeysToEntries.ApprenticeHat: A comfortable hat made from linen, perfect for adventurers who are practicing magic.
KeysToEntries.ReinforcedHelmet: Protect your noggin with this basic headgear made from Leather and Bone.
KeysToEntries.HardLeatherCowl: A durable helmet crafted from hard leather.
KeysToEntries.WizardHat: A stylish hat, popular with spellcasters.
KeysToEntries.DarkMageHood: A mystical hood, popular with edgier wizards.
KeysToEntries.DragonkinMageHood: A hood styled after the ancient overlords of Ashenfall.
KeysToEntries.IronHelmet: Protect your head with this sturdy iron headgear.
KeysToEntries.PaladinHelmet: A metal helm, worn by paladins in service to the church of Saradomin.
KeysToEntries.StuddedLeatherCowl: A durable helmet crafted from hard leather reinforced with iron studs.
KeysToEntries.WildArcherCowl: A helmet worn by a Wild Knight archer.
KeysToEntries.GarouBow: With it's aerodynamic antlers, this bow is very popular with Garou scouts.
KeysToEntries.HunterLongbow: A finely crafted longbow, powerful and precise.
KeysToEntries.OakLongbow: A powerful longbow carved from oak wood.
KeysToEntries.HunterShortbow: A finely crafted bow, fast and reliable.
KeysToEntries.OakShortbow: An agile shortbow carved from oak wood.
KeysToEntries.WildScoutBow: A bow used by Wild Knight scout. Maintaining balance, one arrow at a time.
KeysToEntries.WoodShortbow: A shortbow carved from ash wood.
KeysToEntries.BoneDagger: A sinister weapon, crafted from the bones of fallen creatures.
KeysToEntries.BronzeDagger: A small blade forged from bronze, suitable for close combat.
KeysToEntries.DragonboneDagger: A ferocious blade, filled with primal draconic rage.
KeysToEntries.IronDagger: A sharp, compact weapon, perfect for quick strikes in close combat.
KeysToEntries.StoneDagger: A rudimentary blade, handy in close combat.
KeysToEntries.IronGreataxe: A massive, two-handed axe, capable of delivering devastating blows.
KeysToEntries.ThaneGreataxe: A hefting greataxe, wielded by the powerful garou thanes.
KeysToEntries.BronzeGreatsword: A two-handed bronze sword for those who prefer power over speed.
KeysToEntries.IronGreatsword: A well-balanced, large, imposing sword for skilled warriors.
KeysToEntries.BronzeWarhammer: A heavy-hitting, two-handed weapon crafted from bronze.
KeysToEntries.IronWarhammer: A brutal two-handed weapon, capable of smashing through enemy defences.
KeysToEntries.BronzeLoggingAxe: A woodcutter's tool, forged from bronze.
KeysToEntries.IronLoggingAxe: A durable tool for chopping trees, ideal for budding lumberjacks.
KeysToEntries.StoneLoggingAxe: A crude but functional axe for chopping trees.
KeysToEntries.BoneClub: A primitive weapon made from bone, perfect for smashing other bones.
KeysToEntries.StoneClub: A primitive weapon made from stone, perfect for early adventurers.
KeysToEntries.GoblinSwingslash: A surprisingly nasty little axe. Popular with goblin warriors.
KeysToEntries.WoodenClub: A basic melee weapon. Handy in a pinch.
KeysToEntries.BronzeMace: Crush your foes with this heavy, spiked bronze mace.
KeysToEntries.IronMace: Crush your foes with this heavy, spiked iron mace.
KeysToEntries.SkullSplitter: A deadly weapon, with a distubingly accurate name.
KeysToEntries.FriedCabbage: Yum! Maybe I do like cabbage.
KeysToEntries.Steak: A delicious steak. The perfect campfire meal.
KeysToEntries.BerryCompote: A fruity medly of cooked berries. A great sweet treat to enjoy in the wild.
KeysToEntries.DriedDwellberries: Sweet and chewy, a great fruity snack.
KeysToEntries.DriedRedberries: A little sour, but a tasty snack.
KeysToEntries.DwellberryGlazedRoastFlank: A delicious flank steak, covered in a fruity dwellbery glaze. Mouthwateringly tasty!
KeysToEntries.DwellberryGlazedRoastMeat: A juicy piece of roasted meat, with a deliciously fruity dwellberry glazing. Scrumptious!
KeysToEntries.RedberryGlazedRoastFlank: A delicious flank steak, covered in a fruity redberry glaze. Delightfully delicious!
KeysToEntries.RedberryGlazedRoastMeat: A juicy piece of roasted meat, with a tangy redberry glazing. Tasty!
KeysToEntries.WildPie: A triumph of man over nature.
KeysToEntries.MeatPizza: A pizza with bits of meat on it.
KeysToEntries.Fillet: Roasted bird meat. Tastes like everything.
KeysToEntries.Haunch: Roasted game meat. Tender and tasty.
KeysToEntries.MixedGrill: Why just eat one animal? A carnivore's favourite.
KeysToEntries.MixedPlatter: Why just eat one animal? A carnivore's delight!
KeysToEntries.RatRoast: A survivalist meal. Just pretend it's something else.
KeysToEntries.FriedOnion: A pungeant meal that brings a tear to your eye.
KeysToEntries.BakedPotato: Fluffy and delicious, if only you had some butter.
KeysToEntries.FortifyingSoup: A warm vegetable soup, with added mushrooms.
KeysToEntries.HeartySoup: A comforting vegetable soup, reminds you of rainy days sat by the fire.
KeysToEntries.HeartyFortifyingSoup: A comforting vegetable soup with added mushrooms. Helps prepare you for a grueling day ahead.
KeysToEntries.VegetableSoup: A tasty soup, good for the soul.
KeysToEntries.FortifyingStew: A warm meat and mushroom stew, fortifies you against the trials ahead.
KeysToEntries.HeartyStew: A nice hot stew. A taste of home.
KeysToEntries.MeatStew: Meat and vegetables, the classic combination. A warm and pleasant meal.
KeysToEntries.DwellberryInfusion: A refreshing fruity drink. Very good for hydration.
KeysToEntries.RedberryInfusion: A refreshing fruity drink. Good for hydration.
KeysToEntries.FerociousInfusion: A hydrating drink, infused with primal fury.
KeysToEntries.EvasiveInfusion: A thirst-quenching drink, that improves your reflexes.
KeysToEntries.FleetFootedInfusion: A thirst-quenching drink, that puts a spring in your step.
KeysToEntries.CleanWater: A source of hydration, free from the taint of natural water sources.
KeysToEntries.DirtyWater: A source of hydration, tainted by the residue of a cataclysmic event.
KeysToEntries.StaffOfLight: A mystical weapon humming with power, wielded by powerful Saradominist Wizards ages past.
KeysToEntries.DragonkinMageLegs: Leggings styled after the ancient overlords of Ashenfall.
KeysToEntries.WildArcherLegs: Durable leg armour worn by a Wild Knight archer.
KeysToEntries.ClayDecoration_Unfired: A figurine made from clay. Still wet.
KeysToEntries.ClayDecoration_Fired: A figurine made from clay. Now, much more solid.
KeysToEntries.SkillTome.Basic.Attack: A book filled with knowledge on the use of melee weapons. Awards a small amount of Attack XP.
KeysToEntries.SkillTome.Basic.Artisan: A book filled with knowledge about how to craft tools and equipment. Awards a small amount of Artisan XP.
KeysToEntries.SkillTome.Basic.Construction: A book filled with knowledge about how to be a better architect. Awards a small amount of Construction XP.
KeysToEntries.SkillTome.Basic.Cooking: A book filled with knowledge on how to cook better meals. Awards a small amount of Cooking XP.
KeysToEntries.SkillTome.Basic.Magic: A book filled with knowledge about how to wield deadlier spells. Awards a small amount of Magic XP.
KeysToEntries.SkillTome.Basic.Mining: A book filled with knowledge on how to swing a pickaxe. Awards a small amount of Mining XP.
KeysToEntries.SkillTome.Basic.Ranged: A book filled with knowledge about the intricacies of archery. Awards a small amount of Ranged XP.
KeysToEntries.SkillTome.Basic.Runecrafting: A book filled with knowledge about how to bind anima within rune essence. Awards a small amount of Runecrafting XP.
KeysToEntries.SkillTome.Basic.Woodcutting: A book filled with knowledge about how best to chop down trees. Awards a small amount of Woodcutting XP.
KeysToEntries.Skilltome.Dragonslayer: A powerful tome containing ancient techniques of warfare. Grants a large amount of experience in the Attack, Magic and Ranged skills.
KeysToEntries.Whetstone: Use this to hone your equipped melee weapon.
KeysToEntries.MagicFocus: Imbue your staff to increase the damage of your magical attacks for a limited time.
KeysToEntries.MagicPotion: Consume this potion to increase your critical chance with magical attacks.
KeysToEntries.WeaponPoison:
A vial of Weapon Poison. 

Used in crafting Poison Arrows or to coat your equipped Melee Weapon with Poison for a short time.
KeysToEntries.WeaponBarbs:
Pointy! 

Used to craft Barbed Arrows or to coat your equipped melee weapon with barbs, causing Bleed buildup for a short duration.
KeysToEntries.EnchantedBronzeCrossbowBolts: Bronze crossbow bolts tipped with enchanted opal, that have a chance to summon a lightning strike around your target, dealing Air magic damage to all nearby enemies.
KeysToEntries.EnchantedIronCrossbowBolts: Iron crossbow bolts tipped with enchanted Jade, that have a chance of dealing Water magic damage and slowing your target.
KeysToEntries.EnchantedBluriteCrossbowBolts: Blurite crossbow bolts tipped with enchanted Jade, that have a chance of dealing Earth magic damage and knocking your target down.
KeysToEntries.FireOil: Throw this at your enemies to set them on fire!
KeysToEntries.BluriteCrossbow: A crossbow made from Blurite, thought to be a myth.
KeysToEntries.BronzeLimbs: A pair of bronze crossbow limbs. Used in crafting a Bronze Crossbow.
KeysToEntries.IronLimbs: A pair of iron crossbow limbs. Used in crafting an Iron Crossbow.
KeysToEntries.BluriteLimbs: A pair of blurite crossbow limbs. Used in crafting a Blurite Crossbow.
KeysToEntries.BluriteBar: A rare bar of refined Blurite, thought to be myth.
KeysToEntries.BluriteOre: A chunk of rare and unrefined Blurite.
KeysToEntries.PoisonBoneArrows: Arrows with tips carved from animal fangs coated in Weapon Poison.
KeysToEntries.PoisonBronzeArrows: Arrows with tips forged from bronze coated in Weapon Poison.
KeysToEntries.PoisonIronArrows: Arrows with tips forged from iron coated in Weapon Poison.
KeysToEntries.BarbedBronzeArrows: Lacerating arrows with barbed tips forged from bronze.
KeysToEntries.BarbedIronArrows: Lacerating arrows with barbed tips forged from iron.
KeysToEntries.FireBronzeArrows: Burning arrows with tips forged from bronze coated in fire oil.
KeysToEntries.FireIronArrows: Burning arrows with tips forged from iron coated in fire oil.
KeysToEntries.FireOilNonThrowable:
Flammable and volatile, handle with care!

Used to craft Fire arrows.
KeysToEntries.Shrapnel: A collection of various sharp objects.
KeysToEntries.Airrune:
Equippable as ammo when using a Magic Weapon.

A symbol of blustering winds, essential for air-based magic and other spells. 

Runes are retained if you happen to die.
KeysToEntries.AstralRune:
Astral runes are used for casting advanced magic spells and attacks. 

Runes are retained if you happen to die.
KeysToEntries.EarthRune:
A symbol of the earth's might, essential for earth-based magic. 

Runes are retained if you happen to die.
KeysToEntries.FireRune:
Equippable as ammo when using a Magic Weapon (provided the required Skill Perk is unlocked).

A symbol of blazing heat, essential for fire-based magic. 

Runes are retained if you happen to die.
KeysToEntries.LawRune:
Resource needed for teleportation.

Runes are retained if you happen to die.
KeysToEntries.NatureRune:
Nature runes are used for casting transmutation spells. 

Runes are retained if you happen to die.
KeysToEntries.WaterRune:
A symbol of flowing waters, essential for water-based magic and other spells. 

Runes are retained if you happen to die.
KeysToEntries.Vestige.DragonkinRobe: An ancient robe, tattered beyond repair, but perhaps you could learn something from it.
KeysToEntries.Vestige.PaladinArmour: The remnants of armour worn long ago by Saradominst knights. Perhaps you can learn something from it.
KeysToEntries.Vestige.WildArcher: Scraps of leather, embroidered with curious patterns. Perhaps you can learn something from it.
KeysToEntries.Vestige.DragonkinRobeHood: A hood, worn to the barest of threads by the passage of time. Perhaps you could learn something from it.
KeysToEntries.Vestige.PaladinHelm: Barely more than metal scraps and time-worn leather. Still, perhaps you could learn something from it.
KeysToEntries.Vestige.BagofNoggin: An odd bundle of scratchy sackcloth. It\'s unsettling to hold. Still, perhaps you could learn something from it.
KeysToEntries.Vestige.WildArcherHelm: A leathery coif, long worn away into barely more than memories. Still, perhaps you could learn something from it.
KeysToEntries.Vestige.DragonkinRobeLegs: Tattered remnants of ancient robes. Perhaps you could learn something from them.
KeysToEntries.Vestige.Bootsoflightness: Barely heavier than a feather, but worn away by time\'s cruel march. Still, perhaps you could learn something from it.
KeysToEntries.Vestige.PaladinLegs: Nothing but scrap metal now. Still, perhaps you could learn something from them.
KeysToEntries.Vestige.WildArcherLegs: Leathery scraps, victims to entropy\'s touch. Still, perhaps you could learn something from them.
KeysToEntries.Vestige.ShatteredSkull: A skull, obliterated by a particularly nasty weapon. If you study it, perhaps you might learn something.
KeysToEntries.Vestige.Swingslash: A rusted blade with a wicked edge. Barely usable now, but perhaps you could learn something from it.
KeysToEntries.Vestige.BluriteCrossbow: A contraption made from strange blue metal. Perhaps you could learn something from it.
KeysToEntries.Vestige.DragonDagger: Remants of a dragon's tooth, perhaps? Looks like it was carved. Perhaps you could learn something from it.
KeysToEntries.Vestige.ThaneGreataxe: A powerful looking blade, broken beyond repair. Still, perhaps you could learn something from it.
KeysToEntries.Vestige.AdventurersLongbow: The remains of a longbow, damaged in a dragon attack. Perhaps you could learn something from it.
KeysToEntries.Vestige.HunterStagBow: Sinew, bound tightly enough to be dangerous. Useless now, but perhaps you could learn something from it.
KeysToEntries.Vestige.ShortbowWildScouts: The last few splinters of an ancient shortbow. Perhaps you could learn something from it.
KeysToEntries.Vestige.DragonkinStaff: Although damaged beyond repair, this staff seethes with ancient power. Perhaps you could learn something from it.
KeysToEntries.Vestige.GrievingmoonStaff: What's left of a staff that feels soaked in sorrow. Perhaps you could learn something from it.
KeysToEntries.Vestige.ChieftainsBlade: The rusted remains of a symbol of authority. Perhaps you could learn something from it.
KeysToEntries.Vestige.TrainingBlade: A crude wooden blade and handle, what's left of a child's toy turned to weaponry. Perhaps you could learn something from it.
KeysToEntries.SteelDagger: A fine dagger made from high quality Steel.
KeysToEntries.SteelSword: For fighting monsters and swearing Oaths.
KeysToEntries.SteelScimitar: A vicious, curved sword of Eastern Origins forged from Steel.
KeysToEntries.SteelMace: A brutal crush weapon forged from high quality Steel.
KeysToEntries.SteelGreatsword: A two handed Steel Sword made famous by Highland Warriors.
KeysToEntries.SteelGreataxe: A two handed Battleaxe forged from Steel.
KeysToEntries.SteelWarhammer: A massive weapon made from Steel. Great for hammering really big nails.
KeysToEntries.WillowLongbow: A precise Longbow crafted from Willow.
KeysToEntries.WillowShortbow: An agile Shortbow crafted from Willow.
KeysToEntries.SteelArrows: Arrows with tips forged from Steel.
KeysToEntries.PoisonedSteelArrows: Arrows with tips forged from Steel coated in Weapon Poison.
KeysToEntries.SteelBarbedArrows: Lacerating arrows with barbed tips forged from Steel.
KeysToEntries.SteelFireArrows: Burning arrows with tips forged from Steel coated in fire oil.
KeysToEntries.EnchantedSteelBolts: Steel crossbow bolts tipped with enchanted Red Topaz. Has a chance to create a necrotic bolt that heals your lifeward for a proportion of the damage dealt.
KeysToEntries.SplitbarkStaff: A Mage's Weapon crafted from Wither rotted Hollow Bark. It has Strange Magical Properties.
KeysToEntries.WolfbaneDagger: A silver dagger that brings fear to all those who howl in the night.
KeysToEntries.ShadowSword: This Greatsword exsists between the realms of the living and the dead.
KeysToEntries.DorgeshuunCrossbow: The signature weapon of the Dorgeshuun Goblin tribe. It fires Bone bolts and is surprisingly well made!
KeysToEntries.BoneBolts: Lightweight, but very sharp. Can be fired using the Dorgeshuun Crossbow.
KeysToEntries.UndeadRangersBow: This bow still fires with undeadly precision.
KeysToEntries.NecromancersStaff: Necromantic essence still eminates from this staff.
KeysToEntries.ImarusTalon: A Scimitar forged from the Visage of Imaru.
KeysToEntries.SteelFullHelm: A full helm forged from Steel for Melee users.
KeysToEntries.SteelPlatebody: A strong set of well crafted Steel Platemail for Melee users.
KeysToEntries.SteelPlatelegs: Sturdy and well-made Steel leg armour for Melee users.
KeysToEntries.GreenDragonhideCoif: Lightweight Ranger headgear crafted from Green Dragonhide for Ranged users
KeysToEntries.GreenDragonhideBody: Ranged body armour crafted from Green Dragonhide. Form fitting yet intimidating.
KeysToEntries.GreenDragonhideChaps: Agile Ranged leg armour crafted from Green Dragonhide.
KeysToEntries.SplitbarkHelm: Magical head armour crafted from wither corrupted Hollow Bark.
KeysToEntries.SplitbarkBody: Magical armour crafted from Fine Cloth and Hollow Bark. It has strange magical properties.
KeysToEntries.SplitbarkLegs: Magical leg armour armour crafted from wither corrupted Hollow Bark.
KeysToEntries.WhiteFullHelm: A helmet worn by a member of the Holy Order of White Knights. It is pure white
KeysToEntries.WhitePlatebody: White platemail armour worn by a member of the Holy Order of White Knights.
KeysToEntries.WhitePlatelegs: White Platelegs worn by a member of the Holy Order of White Knights.
KeysToEntries.RangerHat: Ranger head gear. Wearing this gives you the urge to rob from the rich to help the poor for some reason.
KeysToEntries.RangerTunic: Ranger armour that's as dangerous as it is dapper!
KeysToEntries.RangerTights: Ranger leg gear that makes you feel both agile and slightly rebellious.
KeysToEntries.NecromancersCrown: Magical headgear for those that rule over their undead minions.
KeysToEntries.NecromancersRobeTop: Magical robes for those who believe that death is only the beginning.
KeysToEntries.NecromancersRobeBottom: Magical robe bottoms for Sorcerer's that have no concept of ethics.
KeysToEntries.FallenHoplitesAspis: The shield of an Undead Hoplite.
KeysToEntries.SalveAmulet: A powerful amulet made from a crystal that has absorbed the magical blessings of the River Salve.
KeysToEntries.ImaruShield: The Spirit of Imaru lives on within this shield.
KeysToEntries.FallenHoplitesHelm: A Melee helmet once belonging to a long dead Saradomin Hoplite.
KeysToEntries.FallenHoplitesChest: Melee chest armour once belonging to a long dead Saradomin Hoplite.
KeysToEntries.FallenHoplitesTassets: Melee leg armour once belonging to a long dead Saradomin Hoplite.
KeysToEntries.FellhollowCape: A cloak depicting the ethereal beauty of Fellhollow.
KeysToEntries.ShadowscaleCape: A cape worn by those from the lands of death and decay.
KeysToEntries.ShadowscaleHood: Ranger Headgear worn by the Skeleton Archer's from Fellhollow.
KeysToEntries.SteelLimbs: A pair of Steel crossbow limbs. Used in crafting a Steel Crossbow.
KeysToEntries.DorgeshuunLimbs: Crossbow limbs made from powerful bone. Used in crafting the Dorgeshuun Crossbow.
KeysToEntries.SteelLoggingAxe: A woodcutter's tool, forged from Steel.
KeysToEntries.SteelPickaxe: A Miner's tool, forged from Steel.
KeysToEntries.SteelShield: A reliable, durable shield crafted from Steel, perfect for tanking big hits.
KeysToEntries.SkillTome.Intermediate.Artisan: A book filled with knowledge about how to craft tools and equipment. Awards a decent amount of Artisan XP.
KeysToEntries.SkillTome.Intermediate.Attack: A book filled with knowledge on the use of melee weapons. Awards a decent amount of Attack XP.
KeysToEntries.SkillTome.Intermediate.Construction: A book filled with knowledge about how to be a better architect. Awards a decent amount of Construction XP.
KeysToEntries.SkillTome.Intermediate.Cooking: A book filled with knowledge on how to cook better meals. Awards a decent amount of Cooking XP.
KeysToEntries.SkillTome.Intermediate.Magic: A book filled with knowledge about how to wield deadlier spells. Awards a decent amount of Magic XP.
KeysToEntries.SkillTome.Intermediate.Mining: A book filled with knowledge on how to swing a pickaxe. Awards a decent amount of Mining XP.
KeysToEntries.SkillTome.Intermediate.Ranged: A book filled with knowledge about the intricacies of archery. Awards a decent amount of Ranged XP.
KeysToEntries.SkillTome.Intermediate.Runecrafting: A book filled with knowledge about how to bind anima within rune essence. Awards a decent amount of Runecrafting XP.
KeysToEntries.SkillTome.Intermediate.Woodcutting: A book filled with knowledge about how best to chop down trees. Awards a decent amount of Woodcutting XP.
KeysToEntries.SkillTome.Basic.Farming: A book filled with knowledge about how to apply dirt and water to seeds. Awards a small amount of Farming XP.
KeysToEntries.SkillTome.Intermediate.Farming: A book filled with knowledge about how to apply dirt and water to seeds. Awards a decent amount of Farming XP.
KeysToEntries.GarouPack: A brutal bag sewn from hide and sinew.
KeysToEntries.GoblinPack: A cloth shoulder bag, grimy and poorly kept.
KeysToEntries.SkeletonPack: A dusty sack that rattles when you shake it.
KeysToEntries.ZombiePack: A moist and squishly bag of bits.
KeysToEntries.ZogrePack: A foul smelling sack hewn from human skin.
KeysToEntries.Vestige.HeadWhite: A battered helmet. Perhaps you could learn something from it.
KeysToEntries.UndeadBone: Dropped from the restless dead. Use as a crafting material, or process at a grindstone.
KeysToEntries.Coal: Typically found in rocky areas and caves. Combine with metal ores at an upgraded smelter to create higher tiered metal bars.
KeysToEntries.GreenDragonhide: Obtained from felled Lesser Green Dragons. Can be processed at the tannery.
KeysToEntries.DraconicHide: Dropped from felled draconic beasts. Can be processed at the tannery.
KeysToEntries.CorpseCotton: Drops from a volitle bulbous plant that explodes when hit. Can be spun at the  spinning wheel to create fine thread.
KeysToEntries.Ectoplasm: Dropped from aggressive spirits or extracted from wither hearts. Used in crafting.
KeysToEntries.UndeadMeat: Obtained from undead beasts. Can be cooked for... interesting results.
KeysToEntries.WitheredHeart: Dropped from withered enemies. Used as a crafting ingredient.
KeysToEntries.Pumpkin: More treat than trick. Can be cooked by itself or used as an ingredient in cooking meals.
KeysToEntries.Cadavaberries: Can be eaten raw, but wouldn't recommend it. Can be cooked alone or as an ingredient in cooking meals.
KeysToEntries.Irit: Havested from Thorny Irit Roots, used in potion making at the brewing cauldron.
KeysToEntries.HollowBark: Found lying around Fellhollow, around long-dead trees. Used in the crafting.
KeysToEntries.WillowLogs: A highly efficient fuel. Required for smelting more advanced metals.
KeysToEntries.HardLeatherScraps: Dropped from beasts in Fellhollow. Combined at the tannery to create hard leather.
KeysToEntries.DragonBlood: Harvested from dragons and dragonwolves. Used as a tanning agent at the tannery.
KeysToEntries.SteelBar: Made by smelting coal and iron ore together. A primary ingredient for steel weapons, armour and tools.
KeysToEntries.GreenDragonhideLeather: Made by tanning green dragonhide. A key crafting component for armour.
KeysToEntries.FineThread: Made from spun corpse cotton. Can be used as a bow string, and in stitching weapons and gear.
KeysToEntries.FineCloth: Woven from fine thread and gold. Used in weapon and armour crafting.
KeysToEntries.NecroticBonemeal: Made from ground up undead bone. A useful crafting ingredient.
KeysToEntries.SacredOil: Made from combining necrotic bonemeal and ectoplasm. Used as a crafting component.
KeysToEntries.DraconicLeather: A sturdy leather made from draconic hide, or from tanning hard leather with dragon blood.
KeysToEntries.PrimordialHeart: The heart of a nature spirit, you hunted this for Vannaka. He wants three of them.
KeysToEntries.Trinket.RingOfRecoil.Description: A PERCENTAGE of DAMAGE received is DEALT back to ATTACKERS
KeysToEntries.Trinket.RingOfPursuit.Description: ANIMALS are less AWARE of your PRESENCE
KeysToEntries.Trinket.RingOfLife.Description: When close to DEATH, TELEPORTS you to your current BED
KeysToEntries.DriedCadavaberries: Probably not poisonous. A neat little snack.
KeysToEntries.StoneBlock: A building material. Used for advanced construction.
KeysToEntries.Cursefragment.Emberwood: A crystallised part of a curse, imbued with Imaru's grief.
KeysToEntries.Cursefragment.Silverthorn: A crystallised part of a curse, imbued with Imaru's despair.
KeysToEntries.Cursefragment.Vault: A crystallised part of a curse, imbued with Imaru's rage.
KeysToEntries.SoulFragment: Someone may have use for this.
KeysToEntries.RelentlesssInfusion: A tasty tipple that'll put a quiver in your quiver.
KeysToEntries.WitherWater: A source of hydration, tainted by the realm of Imaru.
KeysToEntries.Skilltome.Deathquest: A powerful tome containing the forgotten knowledge of the fallen. Grants a large amount of experience in the Attack, Magic and Ranged skills.
KeysToEntries.DraconicVisage: The image of a fearsome dragon. Used in crafting powerful equipment.
KeysToEntries.VegballSweet: A marvelous amalgamation of sweet and savoury.
KeysToEntries.TomatoGrilled: Fire really brings out the flavour.
KeysToEntries.PumpkinSpiceInfusion: A seasonal treat, popular with some.
KeysToEntries.GenericBurnt: Too well done, but still edible.
KeysToEntries.CadavaberryInfusion: A refreshing fruity drink. Excellent for hydration.
KeysToEntries.SteakAndEggs: A marvelous way, to start your day.
KeysToEntries.UndeadSteak: A technically edible steak. Morally? That's another question
KeysToEntries.bread: Crusty brown outside, pillowy white inside.
KeysToEntries.Potion.WeakHealing: A potion that restores a small amount of health.
KeysToEntries.Potion.LesserHealing: A potion that restores a moderate amount of health.
KeysToEntries.FuelPellet: A high temperature fuel. Needed to smelt more advanced metals.
KeysToEntries.EggFried: Eggs, sunny side up, a nutritious snack.
KeysToEntries.PungentOmelette: Tastes much better than it's name suggests.
KeysToEntries.VeganFryup: All of the calories, none of the guilt.
KeysToEntries.FruitPie: A fruit party, wrapped in golden pastry.
KeysToEntries.Flour: Cultivated grains ground to a fine powder.
KeysToEntries.ImarusHead: Proof of your triumph over the Soul-Eater. It's dripping ectoplasm all over, you should probably get rid of it...
KeysToEntries.AnimalHorn: A cartilaginous extension of an animal skull.
KeysToEntries.WintumberTree: A decorative tree with which to celebrate the festive season.
KeysToEntries.Vestige.DeathsShopeGeneric.Armour: The ancient remnants of some sort of armour. Perhaps you could learn something from it.
KeysToEntries.Vestige.DeathsShopeGeneric.Weapon: Broken pieces of an old weapon. Perhaps you can learn something from them.
KeysToEntries.Vestige.DeathsShopeGeneric.Other: The tattered pieces of a mysterious object. Perhaps you could learn something from them.
KeysToEntries.Vestige.ScimitarImaru: A vicious claw once belonging to Imaru, which was used to try and rip you apart more than a few times. Perhaps you could learn something from it.
KeysToEntries.ZombieAxe: Made in the style of an ancient axe often found in the hands of zombies, it is capable of dealing both Crush and Slash damage at the same time. There seems to be more to this axe though...
KeysToEntries.Vestige.ZombieAxe: A very old and rusted axe, well beyond repair. Still, perhaps you could learn something from it.
KeysToEntries.Vestige.UndeadShovel: The sinister remains of farming equipment. Perhaps you can learn something from it.
